Entries.9: {{Alex}}'s Strength Training Diet:^^*Complete Breakfast^*Salmon Dinner^^(I've learned to love this food... I can feel the protein!!)%revealtaste:Alex:201%revealtaste:Alex:212

Entries.joshMessage: @,^meet me at the saloon tonight after dark. ^   -{{Alex}}[#]{{Alex}}' Invitation

Entries.3917587/f Alex 3500/O Alex/t 500 820/M 5: continue/-10000 -1000/farmer -100 -100 2 Alex -100 -100 2/warp Alex -100 -100/warp farmer -100 -100/faceDirection Alex 2/viewport 64 15 clamp true/pause 2000/playSound doorClose/warp farmer 64 15/pause 500/move farmer 0 2 2/playSound doorClose/warp Alex 64 15/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection farmer 0/speak Alex "Hey, @. Before you head out...#$b#I hate to ask this... but can I have 5,000g?#$b#It's for a secret project I'm working on... I know we have a joint bank account, but I thought I should ask anyway."/pause 1000/question fork0 "Give {{Alex}} 5,000g for her secret project?#Yes#No"/fork giveAlexMoney/playMusic none/pause 1000/emote Alex 12/speak Alex "Really? You won't spare a measly 5,000g to make me happy?$a#$b#I didn't know you were such a cheapskate...$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Alex 1 true/pause 100/faceDirection Alex 0/pause 500/emote Alex 28/pause 400/speak Alex "I just wanted to have a little fun...$s"/pause 800/playSound doorClose/warp Alex -100 -100/pause 2000/end dialogue Alex "I don't want to talk to you right now...$s"

Entries.3917589/n gaveAlexMoney/O Alex/d Mon/d T: continue/-1000 -1000/farmer 100 100 2/addWorldState saloonSportsRoom/addMailReceived saloonSportsRoom/message "It's Sunday... I should swing by the saloon later and see what {{Alex}} has been up to!"/end

Entries.911526/f Alex 2500/t 1900 2200/n joshMes: gusviolin/-1000 -1000/farmer 5 5 1 Gus 10 6 2 Alex 9 5 3 Emily 9 17 2/skippable/showFrame 117/showFrame Alex 39/positionOffset farmer 12 8/positionOffset Alex -12 0/animate Gus false true 723 16 17/viewport 7 4 true/pause 23000/stopAnimation Gus/pause 1000/faceDirection Gus 3/speak Alex "Thanks, Gus. That was great."/move Gus 0 1 1/move Gus 1 0 2/move Gus 0 1 2/doAction 11 9/move Gus 0 3 1/move Gus 12 0 3 true/speak Alex "This is nice... I've never dined in here before."/pause 1000/emote Alex 40/speak Alex "Um, anyway... I reserved this private room so we could talk...$l"/warp Emily 11 11 true/playSound woodyStep/move Emily 0 -4 3/move Emily -4 0 0/move Emily 0 -1 0/speak Emily "I've got a linguini with mushroom cream sauce for Mr. @.^I've got a kale and walnut salad for the lady.#$b#...and a grilled steak for the lady.^And a grilled steak for {{Alex}}."/playSound woodyHit/specificTemporarySprite joshDinner/speak Alex "Thanks."/move Emily 4 0 2/move Emily 0 5 1/move Emily 11 0 1 true/speak Alex "So, what I wanted to say was...$9"/playMusic musicboxsong/speak Alex "*gulp*$s"/pause 600/speak Alex "Well... when we first met, I was instantly drawn to you. It was confusing... I'd never felt that way about anyone.$l^When I first met you, I thought you were really cute.$l#$b#I kept thinking 'I've never had these kinds of feelings for a guy'.$l^Normally, when I have a crush on someone, the feeling goes away pretty quick...$l"/pause 800/speak Alex "...But my heart was telling me something else.^...But with you, it kept growing.$l"/pause 400/emote Alex 40/pause 600/question fork1 "#I feel the same way.#I'm sorry... I don't feel that way about you."/pause 400/fork rejectJosh/speak Alex "...$l#$b#I can't believe it took this long to say that to each other.$l"/emote Alex 32/pause 800/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound eat/pause 800/playSound gulp/pause 400/speak Alex "Mmm... this steak is outstanding. Can you smell that fragrant sauce?$10"/eyes 1 -4000/animate Alex false false 400 40 41 41 40 41 41 40/pause 1000/specificTemporarySprite alexDiningDog/playSound dogWhining/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 6000/end dialogue Alex "...$l"
Entries.3917590/n saloonSportsRoom/O Alex: distantBanjo/-100 -100/farmer 31 20 0 Alex 32 7 0 Shane 33 8 0 Gus 34 8 0 Kent 35 8 0 George 36 7 0/skippable/specificTemporarySprite gridballGameTV/viewport 34 7 true/move farmer 0 -13 1 true/pause 1000/textAboveHead Alex "Big play!"/pause 600/jump Gus/pause 2000/textAboveHead George "Score!"/pause 400/textAboveHead Alex "There we go!"/faceDirection Kent 3 true/faceDirection Gus 1 true/animate Gus false true 100 22/animate Kent false true 100 17/shake Gus 500/shake Kent 500/pause 500/textAboveHead George "Atta boy!"/pause 1000/stopAnimation Gus/stopAnimation Kent/faceDirection Kent 0 true/faceDirection Gus 0/pause 1000/faceDirection Alex 3/pause 400/speak Alex "Hey, @! You made it!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "So... what do you think?"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/faceDirection Alex 3/speak Alex "I've been thinking... You know how I used to dream of being an athlete someday?#$b#Well, my life ended up turning out a bit different... $9#$b#I'm happy, though, don't get me wrong!$h#$b#...But I thought it would be cool to have a place where we could hang out and watch the Sunday game. Gus liked the idea so much he offered me part of his back room!#$b#This way, I get to keep part of 'the dream' alive, in a small way."/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 600/faceDirection George 3/speak George "You did good, kid. I could watch this at home, but coming here makes me feel young again!$h"/faceDirection Alex 1/speak Alex "Thanks, Grandpa."/pause 500/speak Kent "I'm happy for an excuse to get out of the house, and take my mind off things."/faceDirection Alex 2/pause 100/textAboveHead Shane "Same"/pause 1200/speak Gus "I'm having a lot of fun. And it's good for business!$h#$b#Though maybe not so good for {{Shane}}'s liver...$s"/pause 100/faceDirection Shane 2 true/animate Shane false true 100 18/jump Shane/pause 500/textAboveHead Shane "Hey!"/pause 500/emote Alex 32/pause 2000/fade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 400/message "It seems they have a new Sunday tradition."/pause 1000/message "5,000g well spent!"/pause 1000/end dialogue Alex "Thanks again for the money, @. It was a fun project for me, and everyone seems happy with it!"

Entries.Haley_spouse_y2: It's a little funny seeing {{Alex}} stuff her face. She seems to be doing well.#$e#I hope we win the grange display contest this year!$1

Entries.Evelyn_y2: You never know... this could be the last time I ever make a snowman with {{Alex}}.#$e#Life is short, dear. Make sure to treasure every moment.

Entries.AlexsBat_Description: The sweet spot is dented from {{Alex}}' famous Grand Slam.

Entries.BathHouse_MensLocker.4: {{Alex}}'s Locker... There's a bunch of pictures of female bodybuilders taped inside the door.
Entries.JoshHouse.1: Momma-^If you're reading this, it means I've passed on. I'm so sorry you had to go through this. Know that I love you both.^Don't be too upset, I'm with Yoba now. ^My final request: take care of {{Alex}}. She needs a family, something stable. She's a good kid.^ Love, ^Clara
Entries.JoshHouse.7: You peek into {{Alex}}' drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.8: You peek into {{Alex}}' drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.9: It's {{Alex}}' gridball helmet. Looks like she keeps it polished.

Entries.GreenRain: George, dear... Is this the end? It's been a good life, but I'd like to see {{Alex}} find her way before departing...$s%noturn
Entries.fall_Sat: Are you friends with {{Alex}}?#$e#Sometimes she worries me sick.

Entries.Wed: {{Alex}} is my granddaughter. Have I told you that already?#$e#Huh? Speak up.
Entries.Wed8: I wish my legs worked so I could play catch with {{Alex}}.$s#$e#That'll never happen.$s

Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey. So you're the new guy, huh? Cool.^Hey, you're the new girl, huh? I think we're going to get along great. I'm {{Alex}}.#$e#I'll see you around.
Entries.dating_Alex: %{{Alex}} gives your arm a squeeze, grinning.

Entries.Event_room1: Him? No!#$b#...Well, I guess I used to like {{Alex}}. But not anymore! She's immature.
Entries.summer_Fri: I wonder what {{Alex}} is doing today...#$e#Huh? I didn't notice you standing there.
Entries.winter_Sun: Will you say hi to {{Alex}} for me?#$e#Thanks.
Entries.winter_Sun6: Um, if you see {{Alex}} could you tell her I'm busy today?#$e#Thanks.

Entries.Sun.000: %{{Alex}} is completely engrossed in the game. She doesn't notice your presence.
